title: Was he a student who was suspended because he pretended to be a transsexual to use the girls' locker room?
subtitle: A story about a high school student speaking on his way to shower with girls after the gym class is a fantasy.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A high school student pretended to be a transsexual so that he could take a shower in the girls ' dressing room during the gym class.
